title: 船扩展1.1Mod 组建自己的船队！
author: sunzhaoyang
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sunzhaoyang 于 2012-3-15 06:38 编辑 

Mod新增功能：
马达船（Motor Boat）会比普通船快8倍，而高速船（Speed Boat）快16倍!破冰船（Icebreaker）在高速下撞冰不会损坏！你可以为船染色！弹跳船(Stunt Boat）可以在水上弹跳！不要跳上陆地。。。。。。染色船和破冰船放在水里有可能变成神秘船（secret boat ）！===合成表:===
Icebreaker:
   
   
(creeper 换成船)

Motor Boat:
   
   

Speed Boat:
   
   

Stunt Boat
   
   
OR
   
   
(  是活塞.)图片！
Motor Boat/Speed Boat
Have you ever thought the boat in Minecraft is just slow?
Want it be faster?
Now you have choice!

The motor boat has 8 time faster then normal boat,while speed boat has 16 times faster!
Secret Boats

These secret boat have no recipes 
When putting a dyed-boat or icebreaker into water,it has chance to become a secret boat.
You can now dye your boats now!

The cloth dyes are extended to boats as well! You can now make a pink sailing team, or even power ranger colour theme sailing team!
Stunt Boat

replies.author: sunzhaoyang
replies.txt_content:
安装方法：
把所有zip里的文件全都扔进.Minecraft Bin Minecraft.Jar

replies.author: sunzhaoyang
replies.txt_content:
jacky1440 发表于 2012-3-14 20:56 
有些没翻哦。。。
1.1的MOD！

replies.author: sunzhaoyang
replies.txt_content:
姗姗来迟的翻译：。。。。
Motor Boat/Speed Boat
 Have you ever thought the boat in Minecraft is just slow?
 Want it be faster?
 Now you have choice!
马达船、高速船：
你有没有觉得Minecraft里的船很慢？
想要船变快？
现在你有选择啦！
The motor boat has 8 time faster then normal boat,while speed boat has 16 times faster!
马达船比普通船快8倍，而高速船快16倍！
 Secret Boats
These secret boat have no recipes 
When putting a dyed-boat or icebreaker into water,it has chance to become a secret boat.
 神秘船
这些神秘船没有合成表
在你把染色船或者破冰船放在水里，它有机会变成神秘船！
You can now dye your boats now!
The cloth dyes are extended to boats as well! You can now make a pink sailing team, or even power ranger colour theme sailing team!
 你可以为你的船染色！
你不但可以为羊毛染色，你现在也可以给船染色啦！你可以组建一支粉色舰队，或制造一支五彩斑斓的船坞！纯手工翻译

replies.txt_content:
最近好多mod挺喜欢，无奈搬运的人们，虽然很感谢你们，但是麻烦下载贴个国内网盘的链接好不好嘛！！！！
这个，还有多彩火把，还有那个什么忘记了，统统下不了啊
